### Pregunta a

Si exsite sesgo debido a la omisi√≥n de una variable relevante. 
```{r cars} 
set.seed(123)
reps = 10000
betas = matrix(NA ,nrow = reps, ncol = 16)

beta0 = 2
beta1 = 2.5
beta2 = 1

su = 1

n = c(50, 100, 500, 1000)

for (j in 1:length(n)){
  X1 = rnorm(n[j],20,1)
  X2a = (0.8*X1) + rnorm(n[j],0,1)
  X2b = runif(n[j],0,1)
  
  for (i in 1:reps) {
    
    u = rnorm(n[j],0,su)
    v = beta2*X2a + u
    
    Y0 = beta0 + beta1*X1 + v
    Y1 = beta0 + beta1*X1 + beta2*X2a + u
    
    model0 = lm(Y0 ~ X1)
    betas[i,j] = model0$coef[1]
    betas[i,j+4] = model0$coef[2]
    
    model1 = lm(Y1 ~ X1 + X2a)
    betas[i,j+8] = model1$coef[1]
    betas[i,j+12] = model1$coef[2]
    }
}

betas_df = data.frame(betas)

apply(betas_df, 2, mean)
apply(betas_df, 2, var)
```
